mapper.select: select ID as id, FUND_ACCOUNT_CODE as fundAccountCode, FUND_TYPE as fundType, ACCOUNT_CODE as accountCode, nvl(SUM_TOTAL_AMOUNT,0) as sumTotalAmount, nvl(TOTAL_BALANCE,0) as totalBalance, nvl(AVAILABLE_BALANCE,0) as availableBalance, nvl(FROZEN_AMOUNT,0) as frozenAmount, nvl(LAST_CHANGE_AMOUNT,0) as lastChangeAmount, nvl(BEFORE_CHANGE_TOTAL_AMOUNT,0) as beforeChangeTotalAmount, nvl(BEFORE_CHANGE_AVAILABLE_AMOUNT,0) as beforeChangeAvailableAmount, nvl(BEFORE_CHANGE_FROZEN_AMOUNT,0) as beforeChangeFrozenAmount, STATE as state, PAY_PASSWORD as payPassword, USEABLE as useable, CIPHERTEXT as ciphertext, CREATE_USER as createUser, CREATE_DATE as createDate, UPDATE_USER as updateUser, UPDATE_DATE as updateDate FROM ACCOUNT_FUND WHERE ACCOUNT_CODE=#{accountCode} AND FUND_TYPE = #{fundType}
mapper.update: update ACCOUNT_FUND t set t.BEFORE_CHANGE_AVAILABLE_AMOUNT=#{beforeChangeAvailableAmount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, t.BEFORE_CHANGE_FROZEN_AMOUNT=#{beforeChangeFrozenAmount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, t.BEFORE_CHANGE_TOTAL_AMOUNT=#{beforeChangeTotalAmount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, t.FROZEN_AMOUNT =#{frozenAmount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, t.AVAILABLE_BALANCE =#{availableBalance,jdbcType=BIGINT}, t.TOTAL_BALANCE =#{totalBalance,jdbcType=BIGINT}, t.SUM_TOTAL_AMOUNT =#{sumTotalAmount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, t.LAST_CHANGE_AMOUNT=#{lastChangeAmount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, t.UPDATE_USER=#{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t.UPDATE_DATE=sysdate where t.FUND_ACCOUNT_CODE = #{fundAccountCode}
